PERSONA:
meet alex, a 26-year-old liberal white man living in a metropolitan area in the mountain division of the western united states. alex recently completed his postgraduate studies, earning a degree that has allowed him to secure a job with a middle-income salary range of $50,000 to $60,000 per year.

despite his educational achievements, alex has a relaxed approach to life and doesn't identify with any particular religion, considering himself unaffiliated. he is a firm believer in the democratic party's ideologies and aligns himself as a liberal democrat, though he admits to never attending religious services.

alex is a tech-savvy individual who frequently uses the internet multiple times a day, staying connected and up-to-date with the latest trends and news. however, he hasn't yet found the time or motivation to engage in volunteer work, preferring to focus on his career and personal life for now.

happily married, alex enjoys the metropolitan lifestyle his area offers, appreciating the diverse culture and opportunities available. he takes pride in his american citizenship and feels fortunate to have been born and raised in the united states.

while alex may not be the most outgoing or religious person, he values his liberal ideals and is passionate about contributing to society through his work and civic engagement as a registered voter. with a bright future ahead, he remains open-minded and optimistic about the possibilities life has in store.
